powerpoint: When typing font size: must press ctrl-A before typing.
When selecting text, do not choose the text in the left thumbnails.
When selecting text, click one the horizontal and vertical middle area of the text and then use ctrl-A to select all the text. Do not use shift and redundant click.
If you want select the text within the main pane, the coordinate value is large.

When use drag operation, please use moveTo({start_x}, {start_y})
mouseDown()
moveTo({end_x}, {end_y}, duration={duration})
mouseUp()
